org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.modifiers
Interface BatchModifier

All Known Subinterfaces:
CompleteGenericDao, GeneralGenericDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGeneralGenericDao, HibernateCompleteGenericDao, HibernateGeneralGenericDao, JdbcGeneralGenericDao
public interface BatchModifier

This Modifier provides methods to modify groups of persistent objects within a single transaction (i.e. all operations have to succeed or the batch operation will fail)

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (aaronz@vt.edu)

Method Summary
 void deleteMixedSet(Set[] entitySets)
          This allows us to delete a set of entities (objects) that are not all of the same class type within a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the types that are set as persistent classes for this DAO and that each Set contains objects of the same type
<T> void
deleteSet(Class<T> entityClass, Serializable[] ids)
          Deletes (removes) a set of persistent objects in a single transaction by their unique ids
<T> void
deleteSet(Set<T> entities)
          Deletes (removes) a set of objects (persistent or transient) of the same class type in a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the same type and that the type is set as a persistent class for this DAO
 void saveMixedSet(Set[] entitySets)
          This allows us to save a set of entities (objects) that are not all of the same class type within a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the types that are set as persistent classes for this DAO and that each Set contains objects of the same type
<T> void
saveSet(Set<T> entities)
          Saves (creates or updates) a set of objects (persistent or transient) of the same class type in a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the same type and that the type is set as a persistent class for this DAO
 

Method Detail

saveSet

<T> void saveSet(Set<T> entities)
Saves (creates or updates) a set of objects (persistent or transient) of the same class type in a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the same type and that the type is set as a persistent class for this DAO

Parameters:
entities - a List of 0 or more objects to save (recommend use of HashSet)

saveMixedSet

void saveMixedSet(Set[] entitySets)
This allows us to save a set of entities (objects) that are not all of the same class type within a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the types that are set as persistent classes for this DAO and that each Set contains objects of the same type

Parameters:
entitySets - an array of Sets of persistent objects (entities) (each Set should have one type of entity, recommend using HashSet)

deleteSet

<T> void deleteSet(Class<T> entityClass,
                   Serializable[] ids)
Deletes (removes) a set of persistent objects in a single transaction by their unique ids

Parameters:
entityClass - class type of the persistent object
ids - the identifiers of the objects to delete

deleteSet

<T> void deleteSet(Set<T> entities)
Deletes (removes) a set of objects (persistent or transient) of the same class type in a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the same type and that the type is set as a persistent class for this DAO

Parameters:
entities - a Set of 0 or more objects to delete (recommend use of HashSet)

deleteMixedSet

void deleteMixedSet(Set[] entitySets)
This allows us to delete a set of entities (objects) that are not all of the same class type within a single transaction
Warning: Make sure all objects are of the types that are set as persistent classes for this DAO and that each Set contains objects of the same type

Parameters:
entitySets - an array of Sets of persistent objects (entities) (each Set should have one type of entity, recommend using HashSet)
